Uses of Interface
clue.Observer

  • Packages that use Observer 
    Package Description
    clue  
    clue.player  

    • Uses of Observer in clue

      Methods in clue with parameters of type Observer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void GameState.register​(Observer observer)
      Adds a Player to the list of Players.
      void Subject.register​(Observer observer)
      Registers an Observer to watch this subject.
      void GameState.unregister​(Observer observer)
      Removes a player from the game.
      void Subject.unregister​(Observer observer)
      De-registers an Observer from this subject

    • Uses of Observer in clue.player

      Classes in clue.player that implement Observer 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AIPlayer
      Represents a Player being simulated by an AI
      class  HostPlayer
      Represents the Player who created the game instance.
      class  NetworkPlayer
      Represents a Player communicating via a network.
      class  Player
      Represents a player in the game.
